title: Failure = Replacement
author: VD
content_html:
It’s pretty obvious that people have paid absolutely no attention to what Owen Benjamin has been saying for years when they get their panties in a bunch about the Big Bear pointing out the utter futility of the so-called White Pride crowd. Even AC managed to completely step in it today:

Owen Benjamin says white people should be replaced because they are not having children, and so filling America with Somalians is a superior answer. I do not really know what to say here. He either cannot recognize the problem, or he is part of the problem. It is one or the other.

AC is actually the one who should have kept his mouth shut here because he is opining in obvious and utter ignorance. There has not been one single more enthusiastic advocate for young white men getting married and starting families than Big Bear. He was far ahead of me on the absolute importance of young men prioritizing marriage and children over being based, being theologically-correct, being well-informed, and every other form of knowledge.

Let’s review Owen’s actual words, as provided by the individual on Gab who was serving as his self-appointed prosecutor. This was the charge:

Jewish comedian Owen Benjamin says White Pride is a cancer, and Whites need to be replaced because they are lazy cowards. This doesn’t sound funny to me.

You want to talk about White replacement? People always do this clip where me and Joe Rogan are laughing about White replacement like it’s this big gotcha moment. And guys, it’s not a gotcha moment. Like, if you refuse to have children and you refuse to do labor, you should be replaced. Mexicans, Somalians, it doesn’t matter, you’re not valuable to society, no one owes you anything, your skin color is not a credit, it doesn’t make you special.

Right? This White Pride shit is like cancer.

“Oh, Jew, Jew”

I’m a 6’8″ blue-eyed – I look like a Nazi propaganda poster. I mean, I don’t have the jawline for that, I get it, but enough with the Jew stuff. It’s just stupid. You know that poster where the SJW, “Everyone I don’t like is literally Hitler” and it’s got Hitler like holding a blanket or something?

The Nazis are even worse. They’re like “Jew, Jew” and you’re like, what are you talking about? You’re lazy. You have no kids. You’re replacing yourself because you’re a coward. Because you can’t stay with a woman because you’re afraid of rejection. You don’t want to be up at night with a baby, you don’t want to spend your money on someone else, you don’t want to limit your lifestyle and your traveling ability, and so we need people to replace you.

Now, the truth is that Owen is actually making weaker case than I would here. Because the point is not that these people “should” be replaced, it is that they “will” be replaced and that they “are” being replaced because they a) won’t breed, b) won’t work, and c) won’t fight. For all their incessant posturing, they are essentially modern Lotus Eaters who are incapable of sustaining the civilized societies that are their birthrights.

In fact, no one who doesn’t have children has any right to even try to criticize Owen Benjamin on this subject, because unlike his childless would-be critics, Owen is the man in the arena. Owen is the man who has shown up to fight for the future. And Owen is warning the retarded elements of the Right that they are wasting all of their feeble energies on crying out for sympathy that will never be forthcoming instead of the three things it has to do to survive.

To be honest, these online pseudo-nazis are so enervated, both physically and intellectually, that it wouldn’t surprise me in the least if, in addition to lacking wives, jobs, and children, they didn’t even own any guns. Although it would surprise me if they were actually dumb enough to get vaxxed after all their constant posturing about how the world is out to get them; if they somehow managed to fail that one too, then they’re definitely going to be replaced.

The irony, of course, is that Owen is less Jewish than I am American Indian. And yet, his critics always point out his ethnic ancestry while my critics assiduously avoid mentioning mine.

In any event, the lessons of history are very clear. Societal failure inevitably dictates replacement. This has been observed to be the case everywhere from Australia to Zimbabwe. Few nations survive any period of mass migration unscathed, and more than a few are replaced entirely by the invaders. And I am unaware, to date, of any that have been preserved by weak and childless men bewailing their fate.

DISCUSS ON SG
